**Hololab NCSG Module 01 Inspection Foundations VR Application**

The Hololab National Chimney Sweep Guild Inspection VR application trains users on essential skills for conducting thorough, safe chimney inspections to NCSG standards. The course includes interactive slides, desktop activities, real-world simulations, and results in an integrated Learning Management System. It challenges students by having them perform inspections with randomized issues in a virtual residential setting, ensuring they follow all necessary procedures.

**VR Controls and PPE –** Learn how to navigate the virtual environment while getting acquainted with essential personal protective equipment.

**Responsibility & Worksite Hazard Assessment –** Operate in a simulated environment to identify and mitigate hazards commonly encountered during chimney inspections.

**Familiarization –** Understand different types of chimney systems and their common features.

**Chimney Inspection –** Utilize the official NCSG checklist to inspect a chimney system thoroughly.

**Real-World Simulation –** Complete the inspection by correctly identifying issues with maximum safety awareness and forensic skills.

Data reports for review are saved and stored for engagement metrics and simulation performance analysis.

Any off-platform monetization of content accessible in this app conforms to the Oculus Bulk IAP or Subscription Licenses app policy outlined here: https://developer.oculus.com/policy/app-policies
